mapper.select: select chat_no from f_chat_list where (counselor = #{userNo} or user_no = #{userNo}) and end_date is null
mapper.insert: insert into f_chat_history(chat_no, sender, receiver, content) values (#{chatNo}, #{sender}, #{receiver}, #{content})
mapper.select: select chat_no, sender, receiver, content, send_date from f_chat_history where chat_no = ( select chat_no from f_chat_list where counselor = #{userNo} and end_date is null and user_no is not null )
mapper.update: update f_chat_list set end_date = sysdate where user_no = #{userNo} and end_date is null
mapper.select: select counselor_no from f_consulting where user_no is null
